channel.title: Welcome Message. Please Help!
channel.description:
I own a server but i cant figure out how to change the welcome message when ppl login..
I want it to say
Welcome to Heaven Pkz! Owner-Coder.. Aj ~~ type ::commands for all commands~~ ~~ type ::updates for all server updates~~ Have fun playing!!
please help

item.title: Welcome Message. Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @fireboy11985 fireboy11985
item.description:
@fireboy11985 wrote:

heres a tip goto ur client.java file and do crtl h and search for welcome search it untill you find it

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome Message. Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Search for the message that comes up when you login, you search it in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome Message. Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:7, topic:303786”][quote author=IceTICKER link=topic=400069.msg2967424#msg2967424 date=1253686093]
Go on your server login to it, Look On the chat menu, Find What it says,

Go to client.java Press Ctrl+F & Type What it said in the chat menu of your server.

& Change it to what ever you want.
[/quote]Anyone else want to say this?[/quote]

Anfernio:

In the initialize void, find the message for the login and change then compile.

Read full topic
